article_title: Late tickets snapped up for Broncos-Chargers – The Denver Post
article_text:
The Denver Broncos quickly sold 300 extra tickets for Sunday’s Divisional Playoff Game against the San Diego Chargers.

The tickets were returned by the Chargers.

The Broncos tweeted at 8:11 a.m. that there were 300 tickets available only at the box office at Sports Authority Field at Mile High.

The Broncos tweeted 44 minutes later that the tickets had all been sold.

Get more Broncos fan news at TheDenverChannel.com

The Denver Broncos quickly sold 300 extra tickets for Sunday’s Divisional Playoff Game against the San Diego Chargers.
The Broncos tweeted at 8:11 a.m. that there were 300 tickets available only at the box office at Sports Authority Field at Mile High.
The Broncos tweeted 44 minutes later that the tickets had all been sold.

The tickets were returned by the Chargers.
